timeline.bodyText: ERROR_TYPES is not used in this file. Do you want to add import anyway?
timeline.author: sofie29

timeline.bodyText: Is this errorHandler necessary? We could call errorsService directly to be consistent. In other components, there is no errorHandler.
timeline.author: sofie29

timeline.bodyText: I think generalModalService is not in use anymore. Please verify and delete together with import.
timeline.author: sofie29

timeline.message:
TSK-1163: implemented error modal and replaced dangling error messages

since TSK-931 introduced a new error model with a corresponding service I removed all dangling error messages and replaced then with the corresponding error key
TSK-1163: fixed minor timeout bug for alert component
TSK-1163: removed dangling comment and fixed test
